description.narrative:
1. Institutional capacity building and strengthening of the financial system in Haiti, an FCS country, by supporting the first leasing company in the country through an investment and advisory program focusing on technical expertise, improving corporate governance, and catalyzing the creation of a leasing market in Haiti.
2. Support the growth of the productive sectors of the Haitian economy by expanding and increasing access to finance to served and underserved segments, focusing on SMEs. The SME Finance forum estimates that the total credit gap in Haiti amounts to almost US$2.5 billion, with 49% of MSMEs reporting that they are either under or unserved by financial institutions and 35% of MSMEs reported lack of access to finance as major barrier to growth.

The proposed project consists of an US$11mn senior loan (the Loan) to Ayiti Leasing (AL or the Company), the first leasing company in Haiti (the Country) to support the growth of ALs lease portfolio to Haitian small and medium enterprises (SMEs). The project will be supported by the International Development Association Private Sector Window (IDA PSW).
